title: Achieving Paris climate target could net additional billions in fisheries revenue

title_detail.value: Achieving Paris climate target could net additional billions in fisheries revenue

summary: Achieving the Paris Agreement global warming target could protect millions of tons in annual worldwide fisheries catch, as well as billions of dollars of annual revenues for fishers, workers' income and household seafood expenditures, according to new research.

summary_detail.value: Achieving the Paris Agreement global warming target could protect millions of tons in annual worldwide fisheries catch, as well as billions of dollars of annual revenues for fishers, workers' income and household seafood expenditures, according to new research.
